remarks: Distributive law for inner product subtraction.  Complex version of ~ ipsubdi .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphsubdir.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
cphsubdi $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A ., ( B .- C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) - ( A ., C ) ) ) $.
